Verses: 1 karththar Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Nokki:

2 karththar Karpiththa Niyamappramaanamaavadhu: Pazhudhatradhum Oonamillaadhadhum Nugaththadikku Utpadaadhadhumaagiya Sivappaana Oru Kidaariyai Unnidaththil Konduvarumbadi Isravel Puththirarukku Sollungal.
3 adhai Eleyaasaar Ennum Aasaariyanidaththil Oppukkodungal; Avan Adhaip Paalayaththukku Veliye Kondupogakkadavan; Ange Adhu Avanukku Munbaagak Kollappadakkadavadhu.
4 appozhudhu Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaar Than Viralinaal Adhin Raththaththil Konjam Eduththu, Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukku Edhiraaga Ezhudharam Thelikkakkadavan.
5 pinbu Kidaariyai Avan Kangalukku Munbaaga Oruvan Sutterikkavendum; Adhin Tholum Adhin Maamsamum Adhin Raththamum Adhin Saaniyum Sutterikkappadavendum.
6 appozhudhu Aasaariyan Kedhurukkattaiyaiyum Eesoppaiyum Sivappunoolaiyum Eduththu, Kidaari Erikkappadugira Neruppin Naduvile Podakkadavan.
7 pinbu Aasaariyan Than Vasthirangalaith Thoiththu, Jalaththile Snaanampanni, Adhinpinbu Paalayaththil Pravesikkakkadavan; Aasaariyan Saayangaalamattum Theettuppattiruppaan.
8 adhai Sutteriththavanum Than Vasthirangalai Jalaththil Thoiththu, Jalaththile Snaanampanni, Saayangaalamattum Theettuppattiruppaan.

9 suththamaayirukkira Oruvan Andhak Kidaariyin Saambalai Vaarikkondu Paalayaththirkup Purambe Suththamaana Oru Idaththile Kotti Vaikkakkadavan, Adhu Isravel Puththirarin Sabaikkaagath Theettukkazhikkum Jalaththukkendru Kaaththuvaikkappadavendum; Adhu Paavaththaip Parigarikkum.

10 kidaariyin Saambalai Vaarinavan Than Vasthirangalaith Thoikkakkadavan; Avan Saayangaalamattum Theettuppattiruppaan; Idhu Isravel Puththirarukkum Avargal Naduvile Thangugira Anniyanukkum Niththiya Kattalaiyaayiruppadhaaga.
11 seththupponavanudaiya Predhaththaith Thottavan Ezhunaal Theettuppattiruppaan.

12 avan Moondraam Naalilum Ezhaam Naalilum Theettukkazhikkum Jalaththinaal Thannai Suththigarikkakkadavan; Appozhudhu Suththamaavaan; Moondraam Naalilum Ezhaam Naalilum Thannai Suththigarikkaamaliruppaanaagil Suththamaagaan.

13 seththavanudaiya Predhaththaith Thottum, Thannai Suththigariththukkollaadhavan Karththarin Vaasasthalaththaith Theettuppaduththugiraan; Andha Aaththumaa Isravelil Iraamal Aruppundupovaan; Theettukkazhikkum Jalam Avanmel Thelikkappadaadhadhinaal, Avan Theettuppattiruppaan; Avan Theettu Innum Avanmel Irukkum.
14 koodaaraththil Oru Manidhan Seththaal, Adharkaduththa Niyamamaavadhu: Andhak Koodaaraththil Pravesikkira Yaavarum Koodaaraththil Irukkira Yaavarum Ezhunaal Theettuppattiruppaargal.
15 moodik Kattappadaamal Thirandhirukkum Paaththirangal Ellaam Theettuppattirukkum.
16 veliyile Pattayaththaal Vettundavanaiyaavadhu, Seththavanaiyaavadhu, Manidha Elumbaiyaavadhu, Predhakkuzhiyaiyaavadhu, Thottavan Evanum Ezhunaal Theettuppattiruppaan.
17 aagaiyaal Theettuppattavanukkaaga, Paavaththaip Parigarikkum Kidaariyin Saambalile Konjam Eduththu, Oru Paaththiraththil Pottu, Adhinmel Ootru Jalam Vaarkkavendum.

18 suththamaana Oruvan Eesoppai Eduththu, Andha Jalaththile Thoiththu, Koodaaraththinmelum Adhilulla Sagala Panimuttugalinmelum Angeyirukkira Janangalinmelum Thelikkiradhumallaamal, Elumpaiyaagilum Vettundavanaiyaagilum Seththavanaiyaagilum Predhakkuzhiyaiyaagilum Thottavanmelum Thelikkakkadavan.

19 suththamaayirukkiravan Theettuppattavanmel Moondraam Naalilum Ezhaam Naalilum Thelikkavendum; Ezhaam Naalil Ivan Thannai Suththigariththu, Than Vasthirangalaith Thoiththu, Jalaththil Snaanampanni, Saayangaalaththile Suththamaayiruppaan.

20 theettuppattirukkiravan Thannai Suththigariththuk Kollaadhirundhaal, Avan Sabaiyil Iraadhapadikku Aruppundupovaan; Avan Karththarin Parisuththa Sthalaththaith Theettuppaduththinaan; Theettukkazhikkum Jalam Avanmel Thelikkappadaadhadhinaal Avan Theettuppattirukkiraan.
21 theettukkazhikkum Jalaththaith Thelikkiravanum Than Vasthirangalaith Thoikkakkadavan; Theettukkazhikkum Jalaththaiththottavanum Saayangaalamattum Theettuppattiruppaan.
22 theettuppattirukkiravan Thodugiravaigalellaam Theettuppadum, Avaigalaith Thodugiravanum Saayangaalamattum Theettuppattiruppaan; Idhu Ungalukku Niththiya Kattalaiyaayirukkum Endraar.
